member.name: T:Program
member.summary: Executable Program for HelseId Serlvbetjening CLI

member.name: M:Fhi.HelseIdSelvbetjening.Services.KeyGeneratorService.StartAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Generates private and public key. Stores in executing directory if path not specified. privateKey will be named FileName_private.json privateKey will be named FileName_public.json

member.name: T:GenerateKeyParameters
member.summary: Parameters for generating Client private and public Json web keys

member.name: P:GenerateKeyParameters.FileName
member.summary: Name of the file where keys will be stored

member.name: P:GenerateKeyParameters.KeyPath
member.summary: Path of the file where keys will be stored

member.name: T:UpdateClientKeyParameters
member.summary: Parameters used when updating a client secret (jwk's)

member.name: P:UpdateClientKeyParameters.ClientId
member.summary: The client identifier for the Client that should be updated

member.name: P:UpdateClientKeyParameters.ExistingPrivateJwkPath
member.summary: Path to the existing client secret (jwk). Will use first.

member.name: P:UpdateClientKeyParameters.ExisitingPrivateJwk
member.summary: The Clients existing client secret (private Jwk)

member.name: P:UpdateClientKeyParameters.NewPublicJwkPath
member.summary: Path to the new public generated client secret (jwk). Will use first.
